Key_Info: 2025 NBL Uganda champions, First title win, Dethroned 10x champion City Oilers
Commentary_Notes: Historic achievement - ended City Oilers dynasty, First-time Road to BAL participant, Elite 16 Group A qualifier (1-1 in Group D), Notable win: 132-58 blowout vs Djabal Club

Key_Info: 2025 SA National Championship winners, Perfect 5-0 in Elite 16 qualifiers (Group E)
Commentary_Notes: Only undefeated team in preliminaries, +82 point differential in Group E, Elite 16 Group A, Recent form: Beat Ferroviario Da Beira 77-68 (Nov 1), Beat Matero Magic 84-62

Key_Info: 2024-25 Zambia League champions, Host team advantage (Lusaka), 3-2 in Group E
Commentary_Notes: Solid preliminary performance (+103 PD), Elite 16 Group B, Struggles against top teams (lost to Giants -22, lost to Beira -11), Beat Bravehearts 74-59 in Elite 16

Key_Info: Won Group D (2-0, undefeated), Star players: Solo Diabate (former BAL champion), Raphiael Putney
Commentary_Notes: Dark horse team with elite talent, Dominated preliminaries (92.5 PPG, +65 PD), Elite 16 Group B, Beat Namuwongo Blazers 83-70, Beat Djabal Club 102-50
